data.message: It's sad to see the stupidity spewing out of people's mouths because of this. EVERYONE needs to realize that EVERYONE deserves equal rights regardless of race, gender, appearance, and sexual orientation. Imagine if the roles were reversed and you were harassed or assaulted on a regular basis for being straight. We can't discriminate against people because they're not the exact same as us. We did it years ago and it obviously didn't end well. Shouldn't we learn from our past mistakes?

replies.message: Well it's quite apparent that many of you never learned from Sodom and Gomorrah.
Many people do not read the Bible or care what it says. If you call not liking the gay lifestyle, "stupidity" then I guess I am guilty. GOD is the one who (first) said it's wrong. Not me.
